title: BRIEF-Cluny Capital Announces Proposed Qualifying Transaction
text:
BRIEF-Cluny Capital Announces Proposed Qualifying Transaction

Stock Markets Sep 04, 2019 18:00

BRIEF-Cluny Capital Announces Proposed Qualifying Transaction Sept 4 (Reuters) - Cluny Capital Corp CLNh.V : * CLUNY CAPITAL ANNOUNCES PROPOSED QUALIFYING TRANSACTION * PROPOSED TRANSACTION WOULD RESULT IN A REVERSE TAKE-OVER OF COMPANY BY XEBRA. * ENTERED INTO A BINDING LETTER OF INTENT DATED AUGUST 19, 2019 WITH XEBRA BRANDS LTD * ANTICIPATED CO WILL ACQUIRE XEBRA BY WAY OF A SHARE EXCHANGE, MERGER, AMALGAMATION, ARRANGEMENT OR OTHER SIMILAR FORM OF TRANSACTION * ANTICIPATES MERGER WILL RESULT IN SHAREHOLDERS OF XEBRA HOLDING MAJORITY OF OUTSTANDING SHARES OF CO UPON CLOSING

BRIEF-Cluny Capital Announces Proposed Qualifying Transaction
description: BRIEF-Cluny Capital Announces Proposed Qualifying Transaction
